text: This is a list of Italian television related events from 1994. ==Events== *14 December - Debut of Re per una notte, a series hosted by Gigi Sabani in which members of the public impersonate their favourite singers. ==Debuts== ===Domestic=== *14 December - Re per una notte (1994-1996) ===International=== *6 March - Renegade (Italia 1) (1992-1997) *14 August - Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog (Italia 1) (1993) * The Dreamstone (Rai 1) (1990-1995) * X-Men (Canale 5) (1992-1997) * Bananas in Pyjamas (Rai 2) (1992-2001, 2011-2013) * Biker Mice From Mars (Rai 1) (1994-1996) * Sonic the Hedgehog (Italia 1) (1993-1994) ==Television shows== === RAI === ==== Miniseries ==== * A che punto è la notte (How deep the night is) – by Nanni Loy (last direction), detective story in two episodes, from the Fruttero & Lucentini’s novel. Marcello Mastroianni resumes the role of the commissioner Santamaria, already played in The Sunday woman. ==Ending this year== ==Births== ==Deaths== {| class="wikitable" |- " !
